Collection of experiments using PEX library for WebGL.

License

MIT, see LICENSE.md for details.

Experiments

Screenshot Name
vtg - Vorg Texture Generator port of C++ code from 2004
sdf-text - SDF Fonts
blocks - procedural geometry and SSAO
graph - 2D graph drawing and editing
instanced-stream - instancing with shadows
shadows - soft shadow maps
d3-scale-gradient testing build-in gradients from d3
gradient-gamma - gamma correction influence on color interpolation
benchmark - simple cube benchmark
